Title: The Lockdown
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), David Budin, Brendan McCarthy
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Allison decides to give birth in her and Bud's apartment and Frankie volunteers to deliver the baby. Grace has to avoid stairs before her knee surgery, so Sol invites her to stay with him and Robert. An escaped orangutan causes a lockdown.
